name: Deeper and Driller
description:
Deeper and Driller is a CGA-inspired game made for Ludum Dare Jam #48 in 2021 (Theme: "Deeper and Deeper")

The gameplay is a mix between Minesweeper and Mr.Driller

Move your player with arrow keys and try to get as deep as possible.

But beware! It's full of bombs! When you find a block with a # number it it means that that block has # bombs in its 8 surrounding blocks. Avoid the bombs and keep going deeper!!

The game was made in 1 day by me using Construct2, GraphicsGale, Photoshop, Magical 8bit Plugin.
